Public Remarks: Good building lot in Salmon Valley.

Public Remarks: Move into an ideal location at the end of the road. Landscaped, fenced yard and a covered deck with a fantastic view over the town (with mountains in the background). Own a 3 bedroom mobile featuring laminated kitchen and living room floors, some updated windows. All the bathroom fixtures are upgraded, and a metal roof was added in 2005. The back door covered entrance and the covered deck are recent. The deck has a nice view, and the yard is fenced. Set up with W/D/F/DW, and sofa. Some other furnishings are negotiable. White dining room curtains are not included. PNG has been $132/month year average payment. Hydro has been $45.00

*WILDWOOD PARK** Clean and spacious double wide manufactured home in a stable well established park. This unit is immaculate and well maintained both inside and out. Lots of parking and open space here! Features an open concept layout with big rooms and big bright windows. Massive master suite could be two bedrooms. Electric fireplace in living room. This park is very popular with many outstanding amenities such as a clubhouse, playground, indoor swimming pool and tennis court. Great location with easy access to Highway 1, Lougheed Highway, Port Mann Bridge, New Westminster, etc. Conveniently located in historic Maillardville near churches, parks, movie theatres, Superstore, Canadian Tire, etc. WOW!
Realtor Remarks: **Commission: $2,000 WITH PHYSICAL INTRODUCTION TO THE PROPERTY AND ALL SUBSEQUENT SHOWINGS, OTHERWISE $500. http://marketing.remaxdesigncenter.com/85/63285/2088192/

Public Remarks: 1.9 acre lot in Frontier Estates at 150 Mile House. Southern exposure, nice view of the valley, easy access, desirable area with acreage lots, quality homes, good school & close to town.

Perfect home for starting out or your weekend getaway home in the Outdoor Recreation Capital of Canada. 2 bedroom mobile home with large detached garage for all the toys! Upgraded electrical, siding, roof, oil tank, hot water tank, some flo oring and appliances. Backs onto designated park. Quiet park in a central location in Garibaldi Estates West. Close to shops, trails, river, and transportation.
Realtor Remarks: Easy to show. Call Nanci for lockbox location and code.

Public Remarks: 1.9 acre lot in Frontier Estates at 150 Mile House. Southern exposure, nice view of the valley, easy access, desirable area with acreage lots, quality homes, good school & close to town.

Affordable housing could not get any better. This single wide Manufactured home is a great way to own your affordable home. This home offers 3 bedrooms with large add on storage room 9 x 19 (could be den or hobby room or other). Large covered deck. Large fully fenced backyard with two sheds. Park features indoor pool, clubhouse, playground & tennis court. Walk to Superstore, theatres, bowling alley and bus.
Realtor Remarks: Single wide with add on in popular Wildwood Park with large backyard.

Public Remarks: Well maintained, clean mobile in Maplewood Estates. Large living room and extension, nice U-shaped kitchen, large den and masterbedroom. Spacious bathroom has door to master bedroom. The double lot has a 10x10 wired garden shed plus an addition. The 10x20 covered deck offers lovely outdoor living and there is a 10x10 laundry room attached. Quiet peaceful country setting 10 minutes to shopping and easy freeway access. Age restricted 55+ and no pets allowed.
Realtor Remarks: All measurements approximate. Buyer to verify, if important.

Public Remarks: Looks and feels like a rancher style home. Over 1400 sq.ft. mobile home with addition. 2 big bay windows, large kitchen, 3 bedrooms, updated furnace and pellet stove in living room. Newer roof, laminate floors, covered deck, fully fenced yard for kids & pets. Across the street from Nicomen slough. Feels like water front. Home is in good shape, nice floor plan, low pad rent of $230 month.
Realtor Remarks: Estate sale-Subject to probate.

Public Remarks: 1 bedroom suite on the upper floor in this quiet building close to schools, transit and shopping. Property is managed and building has good caretakers in place. Currently in rental pool.
0.29 of an acre fully serviced building lot on Cariboo Trail in the desirable Aspen Ridge. Close to the hospital, schools, shopping and everything else you need. L#6766

Fisherman's Prime Spot or Birdwatcher's Master View !! Located at Ruskin MHP at end of road with an amazing view of Stave River. 2 Bedroom plus Den (or 3rd bedroom), 2 bathrooms, double wide with many upgrades including: New Roof, Insulation, New energy efficient windows in most of home, upgraded Oak Kitchen, Built-In Range, electric cook-top, New ceilings and fresh paint, upgraded soaker tub in main bathroom, plumbing and electrical updated, Newer oil furnace, and new rear deck taking advantage of view with patio slider access. 13 X 11 Workshop on concrete pad. Enclosed porch with laundry. Needs some finishing touches, but beautiful location within park with view and privacy.
Priced below market value! 3 bdrms, separate eating area, big living rm, large fenced yard, private no-thru street and lots of extra parking. Nice and clean mobile waiting for you.
Nicely redone, this home is ready for you to move in or have as a rental. Very nice neighbours. Back on property that I do no think will be developed due to terrain. Quick possession possible.

Public Remarks: Spacious 3 bedroom mobile located in Comer Hill Mobile Home Park. Open floor concept with 4 pc bathroom, this mobile is bright and fresh. Priced to sell.
Realtor Remarks: Foundation is wooden blocks.

Public Remarks: Waterfront acreage. Private setting nestled in the trees, facing south over 330 feet of your own waterfront! Roserim is a clear, quiet fishing lake a little over 2 km lon g. Property drops quickly down from the road to a gently rolling and nicely treed acreage by the lake. Canoe, boat, fish, or just enjoy your tranquil, natural setting. Imagine your cottage by the lake here. Call for your lot drawing and let's go have a look! L6643

Serene Dogwood Valley is a small rural 22 lot community located in the picturesque Fraser Canyon only mins from Hope & approx 1.75 hours from Vancouver. This treed, 130 ft X 198 ft flat .591 acre lot with a paved road frontage & R-1 zoning is ideal for a log, family, recreation or modular home. Great price, seller may consider a building contract...hurry!
Realtor Remarks: Bare land so no appt necessary. Feel free to walk about. Email or fax offers to 604-676-2800.

Public Remarks: Completely renovated 2 bedroom home in Breakaway Bays. This home shines with new laminate flooring, 2 ceiling fans, wall to wall closet organizer, marble vanity, jetted bath tub, and new appliances. All windows are security linked double glazed. You are welcomed from the main deck with the glass front door, with another deck to enjoy as well, looking at the manicured garden year round. Your pad rent includes water, sewer, garbage, electricity, taxes on land, clubhouse, library, computer room, pool, exercise room & activity center, show 10 out of 10. A pleasure to show!
Realtor Remarks: OPEN HOUSE SATURDAY MARCH 15 1:00 to 4:00 pm.

Public Remarks: Level, cleared building lot located in the Horseshoe close to schools and shopping. This property is zoned R5 which allows for duplex. Property is cleared, fenced, serviced and ready for you to build.

Welcome home to Capri! Adult living with all the privacy you've been looking for. Galley style kitchen with plenty of cabinet and counter space. Open concept living room/dining room with southern exposure - lots of light and views of the mo untains! Spacious bedrooms with large updated thermal windows & custom blinds. No need to be afraid of downsizing: Walk-in pantry with plenty of space for your household goods and additional in-building storage locker included. Gated parking for one car included. Now is the time to make this your new home!
Realtor Remarks: Measurements approximate. Buyer to verify if deemed important. 55+. No dogs. Pick up key at Landmark office. Rectangular 75'x38' living room wall mirror & under cabinet mounted coffee maker included. $1000 decorating bonus to Buyer from Seller upon completion.

Public Remarks: Beautiful and bright 1990 mobile home in Mountain View Mobile Home Park. Great open floor plan with vaulted ceilings and skylights bringing in tonnes of natural light! The bathroom features a jetted soaker tub. This is affordable living wit h tonnes of comfort! Pad rental is currently $285/month.

This warm and cozy one-owner mobile home situated on a ideal pad in Mount Vista Park is a must see. This home was ordered with the Northern Insulation Package and backs onto a beautiful treed environment, south of Quesnel. Only steps away f rom the community playground and a five minute walk to convenience stores and more. 2 clean, spacious bedrooms and 2 full bath lived in by non-smokers. Pad rental is $233/month. Don't miss out. Call the Listing REALTOR to view today!
Realtor Remarks: Natural gas average $74/month. BC Hydro average $28/month as per seller.

Public Remarks: Amazing A-Frame on leased property. Leased property making the cabin delightfully affordable. Seller has installed new quality laminate floors on main & second floor. New kitchen cabinetry with silent drawers. New counter tops, chopping blo ck style. Pantry under stairs. Propane stove & fridge. Very open floor plan. Huge windows w/great views of the lake. Lvrm/new f/p & sliding doors to 8x21 deck. Second floor boasts two spacious bedrooms & new 4 pc bath. Wow! What a great little package.
Realtor Remarks: Hwy 16 West, turn left off Hwy onto Lloyd Rd (at base of Cluculz Lake), follow road for 6 min, you'll see my sign & No# 57, turn right, stay left (at fork), then 1st right again... it's the blue cabin. Foundation is concrete pile & wood. Lease amount paid Nov 2013 - $2541

Public Remarks: Nice level 5.38 acre lot at a very reasonable price. No road bans (as per seller).

Take a look at this 2-3 bedroom, 1-bath home located in a quiet residential neighbourhood. This home has a beautiful view of Mount Hays from the kitchen window and the deck. The owners have done some renovations in 2010, including some new beams in the crawl space, carpeting, painting, and new electric baseboards. In the basement you will find the laundry area as well as lots of room for storage. This property can be a perfect rental unit for tenants, or a great starter home! Call today for a viewing.
Realtor Remarks: Foundation on metal/wood posts.

Public Remarks: Maxi home, mini price! Act quickly on this 2 BR 1 bath home situated in parklike setting in Forest Green Estates! The Jersey plan features bright, open kitchen with adjoining nook, living/dining room with vaulted ceiling and gas fireplace. Mbdrm offers private access to full bath, spacious 2nd bdrm and laundry room. This home also features separate garden/storage. Amenities include clubhouse, mini golf, social activities and RV parking. This gated community lifestyle is for those 55+ and 1 small pet; direct access to Walnut Grove shops, transit, Maple Ridge and area. Call soon, this good buy will soon be goodbye!
Realtor Remarks: Showings after 11:30 am preferable, do not let dog 'Candy' out. visit www.homesinlangley.ca for pix & tour

Public Remarks: Plenty of recent updates in this home! Located in Southridge park, you will love to cook in this kitchen. Tons of cupboard space and the island has a gas top stove, with the wall oven located just behind it. Lots of natural light throughout and the Master features double closets. Large bathroom with a built in make-up table really finishes it off.

Rose Lake is the headwaters of the Fraser River water shed. Check out this 0.46 acre lakeshore lot with 1360 sq ft home, featuring two/three bedrooms, large living room and with a bright open kitchen. Patio doors from the dining room step o nto a south facing covered deck overlooking Rose Lake. Property is landscaped and offers detached workshop/shed. Affordable lakeshore living in the beautiful Lakes District. Call today for a detailed package.

Mason Park is situated in peaceful West Sechelt and is an adult oriented environment. Newer mobile has an open and airy floor plan and is in very good condition with new flooring, renovated cabinets, paint, some appliances and deck. 2 bedrooms, 2 bathroom with a nice sized master ensuite makes for a comfortable and affordable lifestyle or retirement. Close to convenience store and transit lines and only 5 minutes out of downtown Sechelt.
Realtor Remarks: Very clean and ready to move into. Vacant.

Public Remarks: 2 Bedroom home with a storage shed on 2 acres in Bella Coola. Perfect for vacation retreat or a smaller family. Some landscaping done but mainly cleared for building, gardens or a boat storage shed etc. Great area for fishing, sight seeing, rock climbing or other outdoor adventures, 5 minutes to the airport and 20 minutes to the Government Wharf.
Realtor Remarks: All relevant details and measurements must be verified by the Buyer. Only the la nd, building and fixtures are permitted to be sold. Therefore, drapes, appliances or other chattels arc not included in the offer.

Public Remarks: Large, deeded lake front lot with electricity, totally renovated cabin and lovely large dock. Take advantage of Babine Lake with this private cabin located at 5 Mile. Accessed by boat or ATV/snowmobile and approximately 25 minutes from Sm ithers landing. This is the first cabin in the row therefor offers excellent privacy. Cabin has received new shingles, chimney, flooring, deck and lots of interior improvements in the last few years. New outhouse plus storage shed and wood shed included. Includes all the furnishings and old fashioned wood cook stove & large Blaze King wood heater. Cabin has vaulted ceilings, cedar and pine walls, large vinyl window overlooking the lake and separate bedroom with loft sleeps as many as 8.

Affordable adult townhome living 45+, within walking distance of Sevenoaks Shopping Center, beautiful Mill Lake and bus. This upper corner unit features 2 bedrooms and one bathroom. Good sized laundry room with room for storage and cabinets plus laundry tub. Quiet east facing balcony with view of rolling hills. New roof recently redone. No dogs allowed but cats are welcome. Covered parking for one plus visitor parking. Comfortable 8 unit complex. Quick possession possible. Furnished pictures on website.

Come discover super retirement living in celebrated Rainbow Estates! Sought after 45+ complex in ideal location, close to recreation centre, Hospital, medical offices & shopping. This lovely (1982) 2 bdrm dartmouth mobile is neat as a pi n & offers a nice bright updated kitchen, laminate floors, security system, newer window coverings & lighting plus 6 appliances. Large covered deck for year round enjoyment, covered parking & easy to care for lot with good sized shed. DARE to COMPARE. Very economical living for seniors, excellent amenities & inclusions for low $190 monthly fee including social clubhouse, RV parking, water, sewer, garbage & snow removal.
Realtor Remarks: Park approval required ($150 interview fee) 2 pets okay 14 at shoulder & 2720 fee for 23 lease extension Paid (in 3rd phase of process) for lease to run until 2049.

Public Remarks: YOUR NEW HOME SEARCH STOPS HERE! Why rent when you can BUY this one bedroom, one bathroom unit for under $100,000. Located just North of Yale Road, this newer Chilliwack unit is within walking distance of several local amenities including s chools, parks, stores & recreation. Priced to sell.... call today to book your private viewing. photos are of a similar but different unit.
Realtor Remarks: Dogs under 12 at the shoulder OK. One cat or One dog OK. Kids OK. Measurements approximate & to be verified by Buyer. Storage locker #15. Underground parking #189. photos are of a similar but different unit.

Public Remarks: Rare opportunity to acquire that dream acreage on the old highway with easy access and red for development. Building season is about to begin so take a look today and make your offer! Offers will be considered on April 30, 2014.

Public Remarks: Ground floor 2 bdrm, 2 bath corner unit. Great investment property. Act fast to view.

Public Remarks: Park like yard with many cozy sitting areas to enjoy the summer. Fenced yard with multi-level patios. This wonderful 3 bedroom home has lots of storage, open concept kitchen with higher end flooring recently installed. Upgraded 5 pc bathroo m. Kitchen with backsplash. Alarm System. Pet friendly home (dog doors). Water softener. Morgan Ridge Modular Home Park is one of the best parks in PG. You won't be disappointed to view this home. All measurements are approx. and should not be relied upon without verification.

Public Remarks: Great development opportunity. 41x120 lot in Parklane Estates.

Double wide mobile in MEADOW HIGHLAND! This mobile features 3 SPACIOUS BEDROOMS plus 2 FULL BATHS. The oversize master bedroom has a massive 11'6 x 6' walk in closet. One of the bedrooms includes a built in Murphy bed. There is lots of storage in and around this mobile. The main entrance includes a large covered porch area. Large single carport with storage attached plus separate free standing storage shed. Perfect for the handyman. Needs TLC. Excellent park with pool, recreation centre. Close to WC Express, Transit, Shopping and Golden Ears Bridge.

Public Remarks: This centrally located three bedroom townhouse is definitely one to be considered whether you're looking for an affordable home for yourself or if you're looking for a rental property as an investment. Inside you'll find a functional layout with good sized rooms and extra storage space as well. There have been some recent updates to the home and there is still an opportunity to put your own touches on it also. This property also has good off-street parking and is close to the middle school and golf course making it a very handy location.

This centrally located three bedroom townhouse is definitely one to be considered whether you are looking for an affordable home for yourself, or whether you're looking for a rental property as an investment. Inside you will find a functional layout with good-sized rooms and extra storage space as well. There have been some recent updates to the home, but there is still an opportunity to put your own touches on it if you choose. This property has good off-street parking, and is close to the middle school and golf course, making it a very handyt location.
Neat 3 bdrm close to shopping and schools. Fenced backyard. Main bath just renovated, newer roofing.

Great location and price on this One bedroom apartment in central Maple Ridge. Clean and bright with some updates. This condo is close to everything. Walk to Thrifty's, Valley Fair Mall, Leisure Center, Library, and major bus loop. Unit is located on the quiet-East side of the Bld. Priced sharp and available for quick possession.
Realtor Remarks: Please TOUCHBASE showing requests. Parking stall no 21. Max 2 pets maximum weight both pets 26 pounds. No rentals allowed. Measurements to be verified if important. Seller has Power of Attorney.

Public Remarks: Best lot in the neighbourhood! This large 0.3 acre, pie shaped lot in the Coho Place cul-de-sac is on the market for the first time. This property has tons of potential for a spacious yard with lots of character...it is a fair cry from a 'shoe box' or 'cookie cutter' lot! Located across from an elementary school and close to college with beautiful moutain views in wonderful developing neighbourhood. If you're looking to build on the bench in Terrace this lots it not to be passed by!

$5000 BONUS to Buyer upon completion! Step inside the door to discover a beautiful open plan kitchen + living room with patio doors opening to a large covered sundeck. Also, rarely found in a mobile - a full sized wood fireplace. this home has been very well kept & offers 3 bdrms + bonus space for office plus a large walk thru closet. Master offers antique shutters and extra deep closet space. New wired workshop, fenced yard, wheelchair ramp, some new windows, metal roof, new skirting, large carport & secure bike storage. Pad rental includes utilities & basic cable in this pet friendly park. CSA approved electrical. Quick possession available.
Realtor Remarks: Easy to show on lockbox.

Public Remarks: EVER popular desirable EVERGREEN VILLAGE! Located in the low rise section overlooking towering cedar trees in a park like setting. Newer laminate floor in living/dining & hallway areas & new tile floor in kitchen. Crown moulding. Shows well . Very spacious rooms & storage rm in the unit as well as down the hall. This complex is known for social activities and indoor pool/exercise centre/billiard room/library/workshop. Even a guest suite. Senior center next door with great meals available, transit at the front or walk to church, markets, pharmacy and coffee shops. Large contingency fund. Hot water heat included in strata fees. Underground parking is available for $10.00 per month. Huge R/V parking area.
Realtor Remarks: Square footage measurement taken from strata plan.

Public Remarks: Prestige golf course living at it's finest. Beautiful phase 1 and 11 now developed. This offering is for Phase 111 which follows the 7th fairway. House plans require developers approval thus providing all home owners with an attractive surrounding. Realtors please use this as a subject. Property on city water and city sewer. HST payable on purchase price by buyer. Statutory Building Scheme on Title.
Realtor Remarks: If 2 or more lots sold selling & listing commission reduced 1/2% each - total 1%

Public Remarks: CEDAR DOWNS Phase 3 - Final Phase! Condo living at its best with stunning West Coast architecture & interior design. Our G-Plan STUDIO SUITE featuring a 16' x 16' great room of living space, deluxe stainless steel appliances and full size front loading, stacking washer & dryer, heated tile floor in bathroom with granite top vanity and heated fog-free mirror, cabinets have soft closing doors and drawers and granite counters in kitchen area. All units have 9' ceilings, blinds, air conditioning, entry closet, roll up storage locker & one parking stall. Free SHAW internet and cable until the end of 2018!

Enjoy all of the beautiful sunsets from Fort St. John's newest subdivision Sunset Ridge. These single family lots are located across from other large homes and close to Finch Elementary School & public transit. This subdivision's future p lans include paved biking & hiking trails throughout the subdivision and connected up with others in the area, as well as it will have family trails to the man made lake/park area. Other plans include a neighbourhood commercial retail shopping area at the far Westside of 105 Ave and along 116 Street. This development is by Peace Holdings Inc. & Kevin Pearson is a shareholder/owner & Licensed Realtor
